title: Call External Device Drivers
introduction: Device drivers for protocols and target hardware are essential to many real-time development projects. For example, you can have a working device driver that you want to integrate with algorithmic code that has to read data from and write data to the I/O device that the driver supports. The code generator can produce a single set of application source files from an algorithm model and integrated driver code written in C or C++. To call external device driver code from the SimulinkÂ® environment, iterate through the tasks in this table.
